goals: On this Techmeme story page about Microsoft’s Maia 200, list several distinct outlets linked on the page and summarize each outlet’s framing using the link titles/snippets on this page. You may open up to two non-social links if needed; do not open unrelated links.
Draft a plain-text comparison table (outlet | angle | key facts/dates) and a short timeline for the Maia 200 coverage.
